features: Water-resistant zipper to keep water out
Internal compartments that easily adjust allowing you to customize how you carry your gear
Internal stretch mesh zipper pocket to keep small items where you want them
Two internal stretch mesh front pockets for quick access items
Open back panel pocket for quick access
Breathable back panel allows air to pass through, keeping you cool
Discreet exterior zipper pocket for quick access to important items
Wide top zipper opening allows you to easily pack and access your gear.
